name: Moon's medication : Your meditation
description:
A play on @mumu_thestan's "Moon's medication" series, with an interactive twist.

The animated meditative pattern is made up of hand-painted medication tabs. It is unique to each wallet that views it. If you have collected 'Moon's medication - Day' (OBJKT 401529) you will see colored medication tabs, with the amount of colors reflecting the number of editions you own: red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple. If you don't own 'Moon's medication - Day' the tabs will appear clear.

Taking inspiration from mumu's "Moon's medication" and "Moon's meditation" series and coded live on @sableraph's Twitch streams as he introduced the basics of creative coding with the open-source library p5.js to mumu.

Coded by @Sableraph
Art by @mumu_thestan
